sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Container, Typography, Paper, Box, List, ListItem, ListItemIcon, ListItemText } from '@mui/material';
import { Info, Code, Cloud, Update } from '@mui/icons-material';

const About = () => {
  return (
    <Box className="aboutContainer" sx={{ padding: '6rem 0' }}>
      <Container maxWidth="md" className="aboutContentContainer">
        <Paper elevation={2} className="aboutPaper" sx={{ padding: '4rem', marginTop: '3rem' }}>
          <Box className="aboutTitleBox" sx={{ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: '3rem' }}>
            <Info className="aboutInfoIcon" sx={{ marginRight: '1rem' }} />
            <Typography variant="h5" component="h1">
              About Storify
            </Typography>
          </Box>

          <Typography variant="body1" paragraph sx={{ marginBottom: '3rem' }}>
          Storify is a platform that allows you to upload, download, and access your files easily.
          </Typography>

          <List sx={{ marginBottom: '3rem' }}>
            <ListItem>
              <ListItemIcon>
                <Code color="primary" />
              </ListItemIcon>
              <ListItemText 
                primary="IT Switch Career Final Project" 
                secondary="This project showcases the skills and knowledge using React for the frontend, PHP for the backend, and MariaDB as the database."
              />
            </ListItem>

            <ListItem>
              <ListItemIcon>
                <Cloud color="primary" />
              </ListItemIcon>
              <ListItemText 
                primary="Cloud Storage" 
                secondary="Access your files from anywhere, at any time, with our reliable cloud storage solutions."
              />
            </ListItem>

            <ListItem>
              <ListItemIcon>
                <Update color="primary" />
              </ListItemIcon>
              <ListItemText 
                primary="Version" 
                secondary="1.0.0"
              />
            </ListItem>
          </List>
        </Paper>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default About;
